attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Rayquaza during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Cling
attacks.effect: After your attack, remove from Sceptile the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon. If Sceptile has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mud Splash
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Beautifly.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sand Attack
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Plusle during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.effect: During your next turn, base damage of Swellow’s Agility is 70 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Swellow during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Twin-blade
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to each Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Supersonic Claws
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage is not affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Critical Crush
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Tyranitar ex or this attack does nothing.
